Title: Fire prevention
Publisher: Chinese People's Liberation Army Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Legal Military Control Commission Fire Branch (中国人民解放军重庆市公检法军管会消防支部)
Notes: A set of six posters, published by the Chinese People's Liberation Army Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau, Legal Military Control Commission Fire Branch in 1967.The Mao quotation reads "Never forget class struggle".The text reads "Raise revolutionary vigilance and strictly guard against arson and destruction by class enemies".
